traditional: 世紀
shìjì century

hánliàng contents

traditional: 解釋
jiěshì explanation; to explain; to interpret; to resolve

traditional: 繼承
jìchéng to inherit; to carry on; to succeed
jìrán since; as; this being the case
shēnkè profound; deep; deep-going
lìkè forthwith; immediate; prompt; promptly; straightway; thereupon; at once
dàlì energetic; vigorous; vigorously
zhèngshì formal; official

traditional: 盡量
jìnliàng as much as possible; to the greatest extent
jǐnliàng as much as possible
sīfǎ judicial; (administration of) justice

traditional: 實在
shízài in reality; honestly; really; verily; concrete

traditional: 解放軍
jiěfàngjūn People's Liberation Army (i.e. the Chinese army)
gōnggòng public; common (use)
bāohán contain; embody; include

traditional: 補充
bǔchōng to replenish; to supplement; to complement; additional; supplementary

traditional: 對外
duìwài external; foreign; pertaining to external or foreign (affairs)
xiāngjiāo to cross over (e.g. traffic); to intersect; to make friends

traditional: 隨時
suíshí at any time
